Body.Content:
We are launching the set screen resolution for unattended desktop flow runs feature for Power Automate. This feature enables you to set flow-specific resolution and DPI settings, ensuring consistent performance and reducing errors. This feature will reach general availability on April 17, 2025.

How does this affect me?
The resolution setting for unattended runs allows you to configure screen resolution and DPI settings directly within each flow's properties.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Microsoft Power Automate - Set screen resolution for unattended desktop flow runs
